Question
========

From a randomly drawn sample of 7 individuals, heart rate was measured at 8 mornings and 4 p.m., with the results being:______________. morning: 75, 74, 70, 79, 65, 70, 68. afternoon: 76, 76, 69, 80, 66, 73, 69. We want to test H~0~: μ(morning) = μ(afternoon) against H~1~: μ(morning) ≠ μ(afternoon). The value of the test quantity (possibly with a minus sign) is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.941
* 0.442
* 2.489
* 1.244

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.941: Incorrect
* 0.442: Incorrect
* 2,489: Correct
* 1,244: Incorrect
